entry.title: Taliban Covert Operatives Seized Kabul, Other Afghan Cities From Within
entry.content: Undercover agents—often clean-shaven, dressed in jeans and sporting sunglasses—spent years infiltrating Afghan government ministries, universities, businesses and aid organizations.

entry.title: In the Land of Dikes, Nature Now Reinforces Flood Defenses
entry.content: Faced with a hydraulic onslaught that is overwhelming traditional defenses, specialists are seeking new ways to manage water that are more in tune with nature than simply building higher walls.
